title: Mountain Spirit Herbal Co
description: For 38 years (since 1985) Denise Joy, as sole proprietor of Mountain Spirit Herbals LLC, has made her herbal knowledge available to her community in the Pacific Northwest, and further afield through her annual catalog. Watch an interview with Denise Joy: Please note that many products have NEW names so that we are in compliance with FDA regulations
